name: raytracer-cr
description: What do I put here? It's a raytracer.
author: x

authorized.description: A list of users allowed to use the raytracer.

args.name: option
args.description: The name of the option to change.

args.name: value
args.description: The value to set the option to.

args.name: pitch
args.description: The pitch to apply to the camera. -45 is 45 degrees down, 45 is 45 degrees up.

args.name: img
args.description: Set to "img" to write to raytrace.png instead of loading ingame.
